Adapt time intervals for plotting purposes

create_plot_data.Rd

Modifies a data frame so that interval starts and ends are not outside time_range boundaries.

Usage

create_plot_data(work_data, time_range, filter_event)

Arguments

work_data

Data frame returned by prep_data().

time_range

Datetime or numeric vector, length 2. Indicates limits of x-axis in main and detail plots.

filter_event

Character name of selected event type. Can be one of the entries of work_data$group.

Value

Data frame with same structure as work_data. All start and end variables were modified according to the chosen time range, so that no date or day is outside this range. Events were filtered according to event type filter settings.
